inklingMod:SwimmingPower.NAME: Swimming
DESCRIPTIONS: Can't attack, gain #b1 [E] after playing a card. Lasts until your next turn.

inklingMod:InkPower.NAME: Ink
DESCRIPTIONS: more damage from #yAttacks. Each turn, reduces by 50%.

inklingMod:SplatWallPower.NAME: Splat Wall
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you are attacked this turn, apply #b

inklingMod:SplattershotJrPower.NAME: Weapon: Splattershot Jr.
DESCRIPTIONS: Add 2 #yJunior #yShots to your hand each turn.

inklingMod:SplattershotJrPlusPower.NAME: Weapon: Splattershot Jr.+
DESCRIPTIONS: Add 2 #yJunior #yShots+ to your hand each turn.

inklingMod:SplatBrellaPower.NAME: Weapon: Splat Brella
DESCRIPTIONS: Add a #yBrella #ySplash to your hand each turn.

inklingMod:SplatBrellaPlusPower.NAME: Weapon: Splat Brella+
DESCRIPTIONS: Add a #yBrella #ySplash+ to your hand each turn.

inklingMod:TriStringerPower.NAME: Weapon: Tri-Stringer
DESCRIPTIONS: Add 3 #yTri-Shots to your hand each turn.

inklingMod:TriStringerPlusPower.NAME: Weapon: Tri-Stringer+
DESCRIPTIONS: Add 3 #yTri-Shots+ to your hand each turn.

inklingMod:DynamoRollerPower.NAME: Weapon: Dynamo Roller
DESCRIPTIONS: Add a #yDyna #yRoll and #yDyna #ySplash to your hand each turn.

inklingMod:DynamoRollerPlusPower.NAME: Weapon: Dynamo Roller+
DESCRIPTIONS: Add a #yDyna #yRoll+ and #yDyna #ySplash+ to your hand each turn.

inklingMod:DappleDualiesPower.NAME: Weapon: Dapple Dualies
DESCRIPTIONS: Add a #yDapple #yShot and a #yDapple #yRoll to your hand each turn.

inklingMod:DappleDualiesPlusPower.NAME: Weapon: Dapple Dualies+
DESCRIPTIONS: Add a #yDapple #yShot+ and a #yDapple #yRoll+ to your hand each turn.

inklingMod:NinjaSquidPower.NAME: Ninja Squid
DESCRIPTIONS: While inklingmod:swimming, reduce all damage taken from attacks to 1.
